title: UC Riverside Provost Cynthia K. Larive to become UC Santa Cruz’s 11th chancellor | University of California
snippet: Larive has been the provost and executive vice chancellor at UC Riverside since 2017. Since 2005, she has held a variety of increasingly important, wide-ranging roles on the campus, including chair of the department of chemistry, divisional ...

title: About Cynthia Larive – Office of the Chancellor
snippet: Larive came to UC Santa Cruz from UC Riverside, where she was provost and executive vice chancellor. As provost, she was responsible for the academic enterprise, managing large-scale initiatives as well as the academic operations of the Riverside campus. Over her career at UCR, she served in ...

title: Provost Cynthia K. Larive | Inside UCR
snippet: UC Riverside paid tribute to departing Provost and Executive Vice Chancellor Cynthia K. Larive at a farewell reception June 10 at the Alumni and Visitors Center packed with well-wishers. Larive has been appointed as UC Santa Cruz chancellor effective July 1.

title: Cynthia Larive to become 11th chancellor of UC Santa Cruz - News
snippet: Cynthia K. Larive as the eleventh chancellor of UC Santa Cruz. Currently the provost and executive vice chancellor at UC Riverside, Larive has served the UC community for nearly a decade and a half as a faculty member, administrator ...

title: Cynthia Larive - Wikipedia
snippet: In February 2017, Larive was appointed interim provost and executive vice chancellor for University of California, Riverside, and the appointment was made permanent in October.
